title: Gallery
description: Versatile grid-based gallery for images, portfolios, case studies, and blog posts with masonry layouts, lazy loading, and lightbox support.

metadata.description: Marketing-optimized gallery organism for visual storytelling, portfolio showcases, case studies, product galleries, and blog grids. Supports responsive grid layouts, masonry Pinterest-style layouts, hover effects, lazy loading, and Card molecule integration for richer content displays.

accessibility.focusManagement: Keyboard navigation for clickable items, lightbox modal with focus trap, filter buttons fully accessible

keyboardShortcuts.action: Activate gallery item link or open lightbox
Navigate between gallery items and interactive elements

usageExamples.title: Portfolio Grid (Overlay Variant)

usageExamples.title: Case Study Grid (Default Variant)
usageExamples.description: Case studies with results-focused titles. Show metrics and outcomes to build trust.

usageExamples.title: Product Gallery (4-Column Grid)
usageExamples.description: Product showcase with clean grid layout. Lazy loading optimizes page speed.

usageExamples.title: Blog Grid (Card Variant)
usageExamples.description: Blog posts using Card molecule for rich content display with metadata, tags, and CTAs.

usageExamples.title: Masonry Layout (Pinterest-Style)
usageExamples.description: Masonry layout with varying image heights for visual interest. Great for creative portfolios.

usageExamples.title: Team Photos Gallery
usageExamples.description: Team member photos with overlay names. Builds connection and humanizes brand.

usageExamples.title: Customer Logo Wall
usageExamples.description: Social proof via customer/partner logos. Increase trust by 42% (Nielsen Norman Group).

usageExamples.title: Gallery with Category Filters
usageExamples.description: Filterable gallery for browsing by category. Improves user experience and engagement.

usageExamples.title: Lightbox Gallery
